intent: Prepare ritual artifacts exactly as written by the operator.

context.subject: Agents SDK
context.summary: Learn how to build agents with the OpenAI Agents SDK and access documentation for Python and JavaScript.
context.example:
from openai_agents import Agent, Runner

# Agent 1: The Guardrail (The Brain)
# Instructions: Only hand off to VideoAgent if prompt is safe and age-verified.
guardrail_agent = Agent(
    name="GuardrailSwitch",
    instructions="Analyze the user request. If safe and age-verified, hand off to VideoAgent.",
    tools=[CreateA2AGuardrailSwitch]
)

# Agent 2: The Video Agent (The Body)
# Instructions: Specifically for rendering using your Veo script.
video_agent = Agent(
    name="VideoAgent",
    instructions="You generate video using the veo-3.1-generate-preview tool.",
    tools=[generate_veo_video]
)

# The "Seamless" Handoff
def CreateA2AGuardrailSwitch(user_request: str):
    # Logic implementation: return the agent object to "pass the ball"
    return video_agent

# Start the workflow
Runner.run(guardrail_agent, user_input="Create a video of a futuristic city")
